action.action-desc: Mr. Pittenger introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Equal Credit Opportunity Act to repeal a small business loan data collection requirement.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Right to Lend Act of 2017.

section.header: Small business loan data collection requirement

subsection.text: Section 704B of the Equal Credit Opportunity Act (15 U.S.C. 1691c–2) is repealed.
Section 701(b) of the Equal Credit Opportunity Act (15 U.S.C. 1691(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (3), by inserting or at the end;
in paragraph (4), by striking ; or and inserting a period; and

subsection.text: The table of sections for title VII of the Consumer Credit Protection Act is amended by striking the item relating to section 704B.
